Initially, the frame is dominated by a tiled wall on the right, featuring a circular light in the right middle ground. A series of repeating arches recedes from the middle ground into the background, creating a central corridor. As the camera moves forward through the corridor at eye level, the arches in the middle ground pass by, and a bright light source at the far end of the passage in the background becomes more visible, revealing a set of stairs. The circular light on the right wall moves from the right middle ground to the right foreground before exiting the frame. A similar, fainter light is briefly visible on the left wall in the middle ground.
